short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Listen to the web, uninterrupted. Waves extension reads blogs, articles, and pages aloud with professional voices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Read aloud any Google Doc, PDF, webpage with Waves – your ultimate text-to-speech (TTS) tool.  Waves let you listen to blogs, articles, PDFs, emails, and more – any text you want to read. This cutting-edge TTS extension is designed for speed, clarity, and accessibility, making it one of the most versatile tools in the Chrome store.Our advanced speech synthesis technology powers seamless text-to-voice experiences for thousands of users daily, delivering natural, lifelike audio in various accents and languages.

Why Waves?
➤ Natural, human-like voices
Our library of voices ensures an engaging, lifelike listening experience, helping you retain and understand more.
➤ Intuitive floating widget
Enjoy quick access to Waves through the customizable floating widget. Dock, move, or hide it – it’s there when you need it.


Who Benefits from Waves?
➤ Students: Retain more and learn faster by listening to notes, textbooks, or essays.
➤ Professionals: Lawyers, doctors, editors, and more can save time and energy by listening to important documents.
➤ Accessibility: Waves removes barriers to reading for individuals with dyslexia, vision challenges, or other disabilities.
➤ Parents & Children: Bring storytime to life by letting Waves read your child’s favorite books.
➤ Avid readers & productivity enthusiasts: Automate reading lengthy emails, blogs, or PDFs and turn any content into a personal podcast.
